[Preparations for the 2nd Class Transfer]:
A Trooper who reaches level 40 can proceed with the 2nd class transfer and become either a Berserker or a Soul Breaker.
In order to proceed with the 2nd class transfer, a character must be level 39 or above and complete a specific quest.
To view more detailed information, please select the class you are interested in.
Berserker.
Soul Breaker.
Close Window.
